text: Charles Spencer Chaplin III (May 5, 1925 â€“ March 20, 1968), known professionally as Charles Chaplin Jr., was an American actor. He was the elder son of Charlie Chaplin and Lita Grey, and is known for appearing in 1950s films such as The Beat Generation and Fangs of the Wild. ==Other websites== * * Category:1925 births Category:1968 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:20th-century American actors Charles Jr. Category:Actors from Beverly Hills, California Category:Deaths from pulmonary embolism Category:American military personnel of World War II
title: Charles Chaplin Jr.
